member.name: T:Reproducers.IReproducer
member.summary: The interface which is used to define the role of a reproducer.

member.name: P:Reproducers.IReproducer.IsPregnant
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not the reproducer is pregnant.

member.name: M:Reproducers.IReproducer.Reproduce
member.summary: Creates another reproducer of its own type.
